statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 201 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY employee_id ASC, feedback_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM EmployeeFeedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 2;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id > 5 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM EmployeeFeedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM suggestions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT suggestion_text FROM suggestions WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM suggestions ORDER BY suggestion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM suggestions WHERE suggestion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY suggestion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM EmployeeFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT suggestion_text FROM SuggestionBox WHERE upvotes >= 10;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM WorkplaceCulture WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SuggestionBox ORDER BY timestamp DESC, upvotes ASC;
SELECT * FROM SuggestionBox WHERE upvotes > 10 AND suggestion_text LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT culture_id, positive_aspects FROM WorkplaceCulture WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM WorkplaceCulture WHERE culture_name LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT suggestion_id, suggestion_text FROM EmployeeSuggestions ORDER BY suggestion_date DESC;
SELECT improvement_type, start_date, end_date FROM ImprovementTracking WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSuggestions WHERE employee_id = 2 AND suggestion_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT culture_name, description FROM WorkplaceCulture ORDER BY culture_id;
SELECT tracking_id, improvement_type, start_date FROM ImprovementTracking WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE employee_department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM Suggestions ORDER BY suggestion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hire_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_text, rating FROM Employee e JOIN Feedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id WHERE f.rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.category_name, f.feedback_text FROM Employee e, Feedback f, FeedbackCategory c WHERE e.employee_id = f.employee_id AND f.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC, f.feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.employee_name, s.suggestion_text, s.suggestion_date FROM Employee e JOIN Suggestions s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id ORDER BY s.suggestion_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.employee_name, p.plan_name, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Employee e JOIN ImprovementPlan p ON e.employee_id = p.plan_id ORDER BY p.end_date DESC, p.start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
